entry.string: There are currently no file associations in the database...
entry.translation: Δεν υπάρχουν συσχετίσεις αρχείων στην βάση δεδομένων ...

entry.string: By clicking on Delete you can delete all file associations with a particular module. Clicking on a module will take you to that module's statistics page containing the figures for each of that module's items that have files associated with them. From there you can delete all file associations with a particular item.
Are you sure you want to remove the file associations in these module items ?
entry.translation: Είστε σίγουρος ότι επιθυμείτε την διαγραφών των συσχετίσεων αρχείων σε αυτά τα αντικείμενα;

entry.string: There are currently no file associations to this module...
entry.translation: Δεν υπάρχουν συσχετίσεις αρχείων σε αυτή την μονάδα...

entry.string: By clicking on Delete you can delete all file associations with a particular module's item.
